name: Dreambow Kickball
description: Play in teams of 4, whoever gets a score of 7 before time runs out, wins the game. Watch out for portals that appear while playing the game. If the ball runs into the portal, its gone forever, and you will have to click on Eball to get another ball thrown into the game. Beware you only have 3 Eballs, so use them wisely. Click on the Amazon link below, to download MC Games to your Android device.
